name: War Map
description:
Once an amazing board game "War Map" was found in professor's cabinet. Since then all the students have given up their study. They are fighting for America's freedom! Intelligent mutant rats are capturing territories and only the brave ones can resist! Join the fight for freedom and independence!
Aim with the gyroscope. Tap the screen to shoot. The enemy shoots while landing. Swipe the screen to take cover. Destroy the flag when all enemies are down.
